mapper.insert: insert into tbl_marketing_activities {id, owner, type, name, state, startDate, endDate, budgetCost, actualCost, description, createBy, createTime, editBy, editTime} values (#{id},#{owner},#{type},#{name},#{state},#{startDate},#{endDate},#{budgetCost},#{actualCost},#{description},#{createBy},#{createTime},#{editBy},#{editTime})
